object.name: ChecklistTasksAdded
object.description: Describes a service message about tasks added to a checklist.
object.html_description: Describes a service message about tasks added to a checklist.
object.rst_description: Describes a service message about tasks added to a checklist.

annotations.description: Message containing the checklist to which the tasks were added. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Message containing the checklist to which the tasks were added. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Message containing the checklist to which the tasks were added. Note that the :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` object in this field will not contain the *reply_to_message* field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.name: checklist_message

annotations.description: List of tasks added to the checklist
annotations.html_description: List of tasks added to the checklist
annotations.rst_description: List of tasks added to the checklist
annotations.name: tasks
